text: Hungary is subdivided administratively into 19 counties and the capital city Budapest.Gazetteer of Hungary, 1 January 2019, Központi Statisztikai Hivatal, 2019, ISSN 1217-2952, retrieved 8 August 2021. == List of counties == Hungarian counties County Coat of arms County seat Area (km²) Population (2019) Population density (people/km², 2019) Map No. of district No. of municipalities Pécs 4429.60 360,704 81 10 301 Kecskemét 8444.89 503,825 60 11 119 Békéscsaba 5629.71 334,264 59 9 75 Miskolc 7247.19 642,447 89 – Szeged 4262.79 399,012 94 7 60 Székesfehérvár 4358.48 417,712 96 8 108 Győr 4207.79 467,144 111 7 183 Debrecen 6210.39 527,989 85 10 82 Eger 3637.17 294,609 81 7 121 Szolnok 5581.63 370,007 66 9 78 Tatabánya 2264.35 299,207 132 6 76 Salgótarján 2544.48 189,304 74 6 131 Budapest 6391.18 1,278,874 200 18 187 Kaposvár 6065.06 301,429 50 8 245 Nyíregyháza 5935.92 552,964 93 13 229 Szekszárd 3703.20 217,463 59 6 109 Szombathely 3336.11 253,551 76 7 216 Veszprém 4463.64 341,317 76 10 217 Zalaegerszeg 3783.84 268,648 71 6 258 Hungary Budapest 93,023 9,772,756 105 174 3176 ==References==
